methods.name: add
methods.doc: Adds a tag.

methods.name: addInitProperty
methods.doc: Adds an initial property to the store.

methods.name: addListener
methods.doc: Appends an event handler to the current Observable.

methods.name: clear
methods.doc: Clears the store.

methods.name: getData
methods.doc: Returns the store data.

methods.name: getInitProperty
methods.doc: Returns the value of an initial property.

methods.name: getLabel
methods.doc: Returns a store property friendly label.

methods.name: getLink
methods.doc: Returns a store property in a link format.

methods.name: getName
methods.doc: Returns the store name.

methods.name: getProperty
methods.doc: Returns the value of a store property (XSS filtered value).

methods.name: getPropertyNames
methods.doc: Returns all store property names.

methods.name: getSessionStore
methods.doc: Returns the session store attached to the current object (returns this).

methods.name: getStoreKey
methods.doc: Returns the store key name used by persistence.

methods.name: getTag
methods.doc: Returns the number of occurencies of a tag.

methods.name: getTags

methods.name: init
methods.doc: Initializes the store.

methods.name: isInitialized
methods.doc: Returns true if the store is initialized. False otherwise.

methods.name: isPersisted
methods.doc: Returns if a property in persisted or not.

methods.name: loadInitProperties
methods.doc: Loads initial properties from an object.

methods.doc: Persists the store. All properties will be persisted as property=value using a CQ_Analytics.Sessi...

methods.name: removeListener
methods.doc: Removes an event handler from the current Observable.

methods.name: removeProperty
methods.doc: Removes a property from the store.

methods.name: reset
methods.doc: Resets the store: restores initial values.

methods.doc: Defines a property as non persited. By default all properties are persisted.
